rows.label: qst106004_msg0001
rows.name: Dadapon! I bring materials!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0002
rows.name:
Welcome back, Tora.
Preparation of workshop all ready.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0003
rows.name:
Me work on expansion parts now.
Kiku, you watch over and make sure
nobody distract me.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0004
rows.name: Leave it to Kiku, Masterpon!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0005
rows.name:
Um... If Hana-chan's going to be all
grown up now, isn't she going to
need new clothes?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0006
rows.name:
Really? I think the ones she has
right now look just fine...

rows.label: qst106004_msg0007
rows.name:
Uh, if her body size changes, they're
not exactly going to fit, are they?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0008
rows.name:
If she gets bigger in the clothes
she's wearing now, things could
get...awkward fast.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0009
rows.name: Exactly!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0010
rows.name:
And it wouldn't be fair on her not to
have any nice outfits to wear after
her special upgrade, anyway!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0011
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0012
rows.name:
Hikari and Homura both seem stylish
with default look. Hana is Blade too,
so not really bothered about clothing.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0013
rows.name:
We can't have that!
Absolutely not!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0014
rows.name:
Blade or human, artificial or otherwise,
you should at least have some sense
of modesty!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0015
rows.name: Hmmm... Hana not really understand.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0016
rows.name:
Tora think new costume important for
increasing sense of cool new power-up!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0017
rows.name: Factor of coolness very important!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0018
rows.name:
Very well. Kiku will make new costume
for little sister Hana.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0019
rows.name: Really? Big sis Kiku make costume?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0020
rows.name:
Yes. Kiku not have many opportunity
to do things for sweet little sister.
Will make masterpiece costume!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0021
rows.name:
Since Hana become very grown-up,
want costume that looks glamorous!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0022
rows.name:
But not losing sense of cute.
Cute also important.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0023
rows.name:
Also, needs to look cool and powerful!
Is for power-up, after all.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0024
rows.name: Meh-meh... That is lot of requests.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0025
rows.name:
How's she going to fit all that
into one design, eh?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0026
rows.name: Is not possible?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0027
rows.name:
For sake of little sister Hana...
Kiku make anything possible!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0028
rows.name: Thank you, big sis Kiku!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0029
rows.name:
But to make such specific costume,
Kiku probably need more materials...

rows.label: qst106004_msg0030
rows.name: What kind of things are you after?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0031
rows.name: Cubic Diamond and Ambler Stigma...

rows.label: qst106004_msg0032
rows.name:
Oh, and Genbu-Weave Cloth
important too.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0033
rows.name:
That doesn't sound too hard.
Come on, Hana-chan, let's go find them!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0034
rows.name:
Understood! Hana will bring very
finest materials for new costume!
